page.title: 13WIRRAL DORMITORY SUBURBS
page.content:
{100}employed parents who{live}in {Parkgate}were asked where they work.
{28}people work{locally}in Parkgate or Neston. Of those that commute,{15 travel within{Cheshire}and{40}travel to{Merseyside.
{ CHESHIRE MERSEYSIDE} Parkgate 9 Heswall 4 Neston 19 Bebington 5 Ellesmere Port 5 Bromborough 1 Chester 9 Port Sunlight 1 Warrington 1 West Kirby 1 total 43 WAllasey 1 {CLWYD/LANCS. } Birkenhead 10 Queensferry 1 {Liverpool 17 St. Helens 1 total 40
15 people travel around in their work. Most of these are{self-employed.
